bill.title: Relating to immigration; declaring an emergency.
bill.description: Prohibits local governments from adopting or enforcing ordinance, rule or regulation or taking actions that prohibit or limit local government or its subdivision, agency, department or office or employee from cooperating with or assisting federal immigration authority or carrying out immigration enforcement. Prohibits local governments from adopting or enforcing ordinance, rule or regulation or taking actions that prohibit or limit local government or its subdivision, agency, department or office or employee from cooperating with or assisting federal immigration authority or carrying out immigration enforcement. Repeals prohibition against public bodies and law enforcement from cooperating with or assisting federal immigration agency or immigration enforcement. Declares emergency, effective on passage.

history.action: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
